name: Invisible Arena
description:
Invisible Arena

3D, FPS, Battle Royale

In a not so distant future, survivors of the last big pandemic fight for the last resources available on Earth, although some of them are so rare that only one still remains. Because of that, survivors of all parts of the world gathered to make a competition for the ultimate prize: the last roll of toilet paper.

The players have suits that can make them invisible with energy, but stand still for so long and the energy will deplete in no time! The arena has a toxic gas that can also reveal the players.

May the best one win!
